name: European Alliance for Social Sciences and Humanities
memberOrga: EASSH has no individual membership but only disciplinary organisations and universities. All our members (so far) are on our website http://www.eassh.eu/members
goal: EASSH is an umbrella organisation for research policy in the field of Social Sciences and Humanities
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Culture, Education, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: EASSH is engaged with science policy field. EASSH is involved with Open Science, European Research Area and Research infrastructures
